thread.subject: Are bananas bad?
thread.content: Is this a good idea? I have heard that bananas can be bad for your health.

replies.subject: Eat your bananas!
replies.content: I pity the foo that thinks bananas are bad for you!!

replies.subject: WTF?
replies.content: Shut up, B.A. the feds might be listening in.

replies.subject: OMG Banana HAX!!1!
replies.content: Listen to The Man - Bananas are bad for you.

thread.subject: We need moar yellow
thread.content: I really wish this text mentioned bananas.
